RelatedSentence: The world 's best restaurant is working on earning that title for a fifth time .

If the words Danish cuisine only conjure up a famous breakfast pastry in your head -- then think again .
And the hottest table in Denmark 's capital is Noma -- voted the best restaurant in the world last month for the fourth time .
